src_original: Wal_1 bhavati sa samayo yad ayaṁ lokaḥ saṁvartate / saṁvartamāne loke yadbhūyasā satvā ābhāsvare devanikāye upapadyante / te tatra bhavanti rūpiṇo manomayā avikalā ahīnendriyāḥ sarvāṅgapratyaṁ gopetāḥ śubhā varṇasthāyinaḥ svayaṁprabhā vaihāyasagāminaḥ prītibhakṣāḥ prītyāhārā dīrghāyuṣo dīrgham adhvānaṁ tiṣṭhanti /
tgt_original: 「或有是時，此世還成世間，眾生多有生光音天者，自然化生，歡喜為食，身光自照，神足飛空，安樂無礙，壽命長久。

src_original: Wal_4 tena khalu samayena na sūryacandramasau prajñāyete na rātridivasaṁ na māsaṁ ardhamāsaṁ na ṛtuṁ na kṣaṇalavamuhūrtaṁ prajñāyante … na strī na pumān / satvaḥ satva ity ekasaṁkhyāṁ gacchati /
tgt_original: 爾時，無有男女、尊卑、上下，亦無異名，眾共生世，故名眾生。

src_original: Wal_5 athānyatamo lolupajātīyaḥ satvaḥ aṁgulyagreṇa pṛthivīrasam āsvādayati / yathā yathāsvādayati tathā tathā pratikāṁkṣati / yathā yathā pratikāṁkṣati tathā tathā kabaḍiṁkāropakrameṇa praparibhuktaḥ / Wal_6 adrākṣur anyatame satvās taṁ satvaṁ kabaḍiṅkāropakrameṇa pṛthivīrasaṁ paribhuñjānam /
tgt_original: 「是時，此地有自然地味出，凝停於地，猶如醍醐，地味出時，亦復如是，猶如生酥，味甜如蜜。 其後眾生以手試甞知為何味，初甞覺好，遂生味著。 如是展轉甞之不已，遂生貪著，便以手掬，漸成摶食，摶食不已，餘眾生見，復效食之，食之不已。

src_original: Wal_2 tena khalu samayena mahāpṛthivī ekodikā bhavati ekārṇavā / tasyāṁ ekodikāyāṁ mahāpṛthivyāṁ ekārṇavāyāṁ vāyunā śaraḥ saṁmūrcchitaḥ saṁtanoti tadyathā pakvasya kṣīrasya śaraḥ
tgt_original: 其後此世變成大水，周遍彌滿。 當於爾時，天下大闇，無有日月、星辰、晝夜，亦無歲月、四時之數。

src_original: śaraḥ saṁmūrcchitaḥ saṁtanoti / sa bhavati pṛthivīraso varṇasaṁpanno gandhasaṁpanno rasasaṁpannaḥ / tadyathā navanītam evaṁvarṇaḥ / tadyathā kṣaudraṁ madhv aneḍakam evamāsvādaḥ / Wal_3 bhavati sa samayo yad ayaṁ loko vivartate / vivartamāne loke satvā āyuḥkṣayāt karmakṣayāt puṇyakṣayād ābhāsvarād devanikāyāc cavitvā ihatye manuṣyasabhāgatām āgaccanti / te ’pi rūpiṇo pūrvavad yāvad dīrgham adhvānam tiṣṭhanti /
tgt_original: 其後此世還欲變時，有餘眾生福盡、行盡、命盡，從光音天命終，來生此間，皆悉化生，歡喜為食，身光自照，神足飛空，安樂無礙，久住此間。
